XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="OrderApprovedCube" displayName="OrderApprovedCube" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="Stc.Data.OrderApproved" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="Course" displayName="Курс" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Name" allDisplayName="Name" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="Course.Name" name="Course" displayName="Курс" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="Course.Name.Value" name="Value" displayName="Курс" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="OrderStatus" displayName="Статус" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All OrderStatus" allDisplayName="OrderStatus" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="OrderStatus.Name" name="Name" displayName="Статус" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="OrderStatus.Name.Value" name="Value" displayName="Статус" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="StudentsNumber" name="StudentsNumber" displayName="Количество слушателей" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> </cube>
